DataElement.preferredName: Investigator Study Site Research Personnel Role Primary Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A researcher at a study site who oversees multiple aspects of the study at a site, including protocol submission for IRB approval, participant recruitment, informed consent, data collection, and analysis. Specifies whether this is the main or principal study site personnel.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Investigator Study Site Research Personnel Role Primary Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:People engaged in research.:The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true. The indicator usually takes the form of a single binary digit, or bit (either 0 or 1). (from Dictionary of Computers)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per  model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
